sentences.en: "She has a large flat in Mayfair." — "Just so."
sentences.cn: “她在梅费尔有个大公寓。”——“正是。”

sentences.en: [as adj. flat-out]flat-out perjury.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑的伪证。

sentences.en: [as adj. flat-out]the album lacks the flat-out urgency of its predecessor.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑不像上一张那样迫在眉睫。

sentences.en: a perfectly flat sandy beach
sentences.cn: 十分平坦的沙滩

sentences.en: a two-bedroom flat
sentences.cn: 带两间卧室的公寓

sentences.en: Charlie humped his rucksack up the stairs to his flat.
sentences.cn: 查利费力地将背包背到楼上自己的公寓里。

sentences.en: Could this really stop the champagne from going flat?
sentences.cn: 这真的能让香槟不走气吗？

sentences.en: Fresh prints of both girls were found in the flat.
sentences.cn: 在公寓里发现了两个女孩不久前留下的指纹。

sentences.en: He lay flat on the floor.
sentences.cn: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.en: He then keeled over and fell flat on his back.
sentences.cn: 然后，他便仰天倒下了。

sentences.en: he won't go into a home and that's flat.
sentences.cn: 他不愿成家，就这么简单。

sentences.en: his jokes fell flat.
sentences.cn: 他的笑话都没有达到预期效果。

sentences.en: houses with flat roofs
sentences.cn: 平顶房

sentences.en: I had the flat decorated quickly so that Philippa could move in.
sentences.cn: 我很快地把公寓粉刷了一遍，这样菲利帕就能搬进来了。

sentences.en: I lay the painting flat to stop the wet paint running.
sentences.cn: 我把油画平放以防止未干的颜料流动。

sentences.en: in my third year I left home and went flatting with David.
sentences.cn: 三年级的时候我离开家，和大卫合租了一套公寓。

sentences.en: in those early days I'd just flat out vote against foreign aid.
sentences.cn: 开始的那几天我只会毫不含糊地投票反对外来援助。

sentences.en: My home state of Illinois is flat as a pancake.
sentences.cn: 我的故乡伊利诺伊州一马平川。

sentences.en: She had small feet and hands and a flat, round face.
sentences.cn: 她的手脚都很小，脸又扁又圆。

sentences.en: she was lying flat out on her pink bath towel.
sentences.cn: 她舒展全身，躺在粉红色的浴巾上。

sentences.en: That night I lay flat on my back and stared up at the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 那一夜，我仰面平躺，眼睛直直地盯着天花板。

sentences.en: The bed can be folded flat for storage.
sentences.cn: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.en: The building was knocked down to make way for a block of flats (= a large building with many flats in it ) .
sentences.cn: 那幢建筑被拆了，腾出地方建一幢公寓楼。

sentences.en: the car wouldn't go uphill or overtake on the flat.
sentences.cn: 这辆车既不会爬坡上坎，也不会平地超车。

sentences.en: The choice will be between a flat-rate or a banded charge.
sentences.cn: 将在统一费用和分级费用之间作出选择。

sentences.en: The countryside near there is flat as a pancake (= very flat ) .
sentences.cn: 那儿附近的乡间地势非常平坦。

sentences.en: The monthly rent for a two-bedroom flat would be £953.33.
sentences.cn: 双卧室的公寓每月房租是953.33英镑。

sentences.en: the whole team is working flat out to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 整个团队正竭尽全力来满足需求。

sentences.en: They had put a padlock on the door of his flat.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在他的公寓门上上了把挂锁。

sentences.en: They have a flat in Crouch End.
sentences.cn: 他们在蹲尾区有一套公寓。

sentences.en: They hurtled across the line in a flat-out sprint.
sentences.cn: 他们拼命冲刺，越过终点线。

sentences.en: Two years later he is flat broke and on the dole.
sentences.cn: 两年后，他一贫如洗，靠失业救济金生活。

sentences.en: Warm weather has attracted the flat fish close to shore.
sentences.cn: 煦暖的气候将比目鱼引到了近海。

sentences.en: Work on a clean, flat surface.
sentences.cn: 在干净、平整的台面上工作。

words.tran_cn: 断然地；平平地；直截了当地
合住一套公寓的人；合租者
平坦的；扁平的；浅的；单调的

phrases.tran_cn: 完全失败，完全未达到预期效果
卧倒；引不起兴趣；完全失败
（尤指熟睡或疲惫时）四肢摊开
平筛，平板筛浆机；平面屏幕
没精打采；漏了气的车胎
(非正式)就这么简单（用来表示作了决定而且不会改弦更张）
潮滩；潮汐平原；潮汐舱内甲板；潮汐滩

trans.tran_cn: 平坦的，扁平的，水平的，浅的，瘪的，断然的，停滞的，平淡的，无泡的，没电的，降半音的
trans.tran_en: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving

trans.tran_cn: 平躺地，断然地，比标准音低地
trans.tran_en: in a position in which the surface of something is against another surface without curving or sloping

trans.tran_cn: 公寓，平地，平面，瘪的轮胎
trans.tran_en: a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building

trans.tran_cn: 逐渐变平；[音乐]以降调唱（或奏）
使变平；[音乐]使（音调）下降，尤指降半音
